20110124131009.000|20110124131012.000|CC1|FINANCE BILL, WHICH IS REQUIRED 
20110124131012.000|20110124131015.000|CC1|AS PART OF THE TERMS OF THE

20110124131018.000|20110124131019.000|CC1|IT IS CRUCIAL BUT PARTIES CANNOT

20110124131041.000|20110124131043.000|CC1|AGAIN TODAY TO TRY TO PUT AN END
20110124131043.000|20110124131046.000|CC1|TO THE CRISIS.                  
20110124131046.000|20110124131048.000|CC1|>> A STARK WARNING FROM ONE OF  
20110124131048.000|20110124131050.000|CC1|THE U.K. GOVERNMENT SENIOR      
20110124131050.000|20110124131052.000|CC1|ADVISERS THAT URGENT ACTION MUST

20110124131054.000|20110124131055.000|CC1|THE NEXT GENERATION FROM A      
20110124131055.000|20110124131100.000|CC1|GLOBAL FOOD CRISIS.             
20110124131100.000|20110124131102.000|CC1|INTERNATIONAL LEADERS MUST ARE  
20110124131102.000|20110124131103.000|CC1|WORKING THE OTHER NOW TO FIND   
20110124131103.000|20110124131109.000|CC1|WAYS TO BOOST PRODUCTION.       
20110124131109.000|20110124131112.000|CC1|>> SERIOUS RIOTING IN ALGERIA   
20110124131112.000|20110124131116.000|CC1|THREATENS THE GOVERNMENT.       
20110124131116.000|20110124131117.000|CC1|SCIENTISTS BELIEVE THAT SUCH    
20110124131117.000|20110124131119.000|CC1|SCENES COULD BECOME TYPICAL     
20110124131119.000|20110124131120.000|CC1|ALLOWS GOVERNMENTS BEGAN TO     
20110124131120.000|20110124131123.000|CC1|PRODUCE FOOD MORE EFFICIENTLY.  
20110124131123.000|20110124131125.000|CC1|WHILE THE GLOBAL POPULATION     
20110124131125.000|20110124131127.000|CC1|CONTINUES TO GROW, CLIMATE      
20110124131127.000|20110124131129.000|CC1|CHANGE AND SCARCITY OF WATER AND
20110124131129.000|20110124131132.000|CC1|ENERGY WILL PUT PRESSURE ON THE 
20110124131132.000|20110124131133.000|CC1|FOOD PRODUCTION SYSTEM.
